author: USA TODAY - Christopher Cann
title: Storms pummel northern Florida; widespread damage in Tallahassee: Weather updates | Flipboard
text: Storms pummel northern Florida; widespread damage in Tallahassee: Weather updates A wave of severe weather from a deadly storm system began to pummel northern Florida on Friday, damaging buildings, uprooting trees and knocking out power to more than 200,000 homes and businesses. Witnesses reported a possible tornado in Tallahassee, the State Capital, where damage was widespread … [USA TODAY](/@USAToday) flipped this story into [Top Stories](/@usatoday/top-stories-u1i7u70sz)•1h More stories from [North Florida](/topic/northflorida) [Florida Tornado Sparks Sudden Warning: 'Take Cover Now!'](/topic/northflorida/florida-tornado-sparks-sudden-warning-take-cover-now/a-RjR746WfRneh0j-MPceyaQ%3Aa%3A1778189168-ee7e1bfde6%2Fnewsweek.com) On Friday morning, Florida residents were warned that a tornado was headed their way and they needed to find shelter immediately.
